timeline.bodyText: Why are the domain-specific terms like Travels, Visa, etc mentioned in common package? The query should be generalized imo and the actual domain passed as argument.
timeline.author: jstastny-cz
jstastny-cz

timeline.bodyText: Should not be handled like this - Travels, Visa, Deals are domain-specific, whereas Job and UserTask are general entities. I think this is not correct approach to take.
timeline.author: jstastny-cz
